# âœ… What's next?

1. Familiarize yourself with our [Guidelines](https://github.com/holdex/developers/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md);
1. Execute a trial by merging two PRs:
    - 1st PR: submit your profile (see the instructions below)
    - 2nd PR: complete a test by solving a problem from [this list](https://github.com/holdex/trial/issues/?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3Atrial-task) or choose it from [this Google Doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Rj58El199h_Gr9vVLn9aQu4jV-QGcBwWKZSL_40ptuY)
1. Follow our socials and consider tweeting about us:
    - [Official Holdex X](https://x.com/HoldexIo)
    - [Holdex CEO](https://x.com/zolotokrylin)
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/holdex)
   
# How to Submit Your Profile  

1. Fork this repository
1. Add your profile in the [`profile-submission.json`](/profile-submission.json) file: 
1. Create a Pull Request (PR), [attach it to this issue](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/tracking-your-work-with-issues/using-issues/linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue#about-linked-issues-and-pull-requests) and wait for the review.

# Questions? 
If you have any questions, feel free to ask them directly in this issue ðŸ˜‰
